# Azure Stream Analytics
Azure Stream Analytics is a real-time analytics and complex event-processing engine that is designed to analyze and process high volumes of fast streaming data from multiple sources simutaneously.

![Azure Stream Analytics](../images/azure-stream-analytics.png){.center .image-large}

- Analyze real-time telemetry streams from IoT devices.
- Web logs/clickstream analytics.
- Geospatial analytics for fleet management and driverless vehicles.
- Remote monitoring and prediuctive maintenance of high value assets.
- Real-time analytics on point-of-sale data for inventory control and anomaly detection.
